[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span {
            line: 1,
            column: 1,
            position: 0,
        },
    ),
    Block(
        Braced {
            left_brace: Span {
                line: 1,
                column: 7,
                position: 6,
            },
            inner: [
                Expression {
                    expression: Variable(
                        SimpleVariable(
                            SimpleVariable {
                                span: Span {
                                    line: 1,
                                    column: 9,
                                    position: 8,
                                },
                                name: "$a",
                            },
                        ),
                    ),
                    ending: Semicolon(
                        Span {
                            line: 1,
                            column: 11,
                            position: 10,
                        },
                    ),
                },
            ],
            right_brace: Span {
                line: 1,
                column: 13,
                position: 12,
            },
        },
    ),
]
